links.title: These 3 Dow Jones Stocks Are Near Buy Points As 2 FANGs Make Bullish Move; S&P 500 Futures | Stock News & Stock Market Analysis - IBD
links.description: Futures for the S&P 500 index, Dow Jones industrial average and Nasdaq 100 edged lower late Wednesday after the Nasdaq composite rallied Wednesday on tariff headlines while the S&P 500 index and Dow Jones slashed losses. Three Dow Jones stocks are near buy points in bullish bases: Apple ( AAPL), Microsoft ( MSFT), and Visa ( V).

$AAPL finds more serious supplier problems as its audits expand https://goo.gl/xgxAbX

links.title: Apple finds more serious supplier problems as its audits expand
links.description: Apple said on Wednesday it had found a higher number of serious violations of its labor and environmental policies for suppliers, such as falsifying work hours data, as it expanded the scope of its annual audit of conditions of workers making its iPhones and other products.

links.title: Will Apple Buy Snap?
links.description: Over the past few weeks, employees of Snap have been moving their headquarters a few miles across Los Angeles, from the Venice Beach boardwalk to a massive, 300,000-square-foot space at the Santa Monica Business Park.

messages.body: imagine the backlash from investors and product users if a company like $TWTR $AAPL $MSFT would make a buyout offer.
